Jindalee Boat Ramp Park, Mt Ommaney Drive, Jindalee, Australia

Jindalee Boat Ramp Status: PONTOON CLOSED following January 2013 severe weather event. Further inspections have been programmed for the pontoon and repairs to the gangway commissioned. A confirmed date for completion of the works and re-opening is still to be determined.

item.title: Free Mini-Bus Tours
item.description:
Friday, June 7, 2013, 10:45am – 12pm



This entertaining tour takes you throughout the Gardens’ smaller paths incorporating garden highlights and the 27 hectare Australian Plant Communities. Whole of gardens tour by your driver/gardener Roy, with an Australian Plant Communities focus. Departs from the Information Kiosk. No bookings required. 11 seats available per tour. For more information phone 3403 2535. Not available on public holidays.

Cost: Free
Bookings: For more information, phone (07) 3403 2535.
Venue: Brisbane Botanic Gardens, Mt Coot-tha
Venue address: Mount Coot-tha Road, Mount Coot-tha
